attributes.review: So there I was just a regular Saturday night when I heard that Donald trump (the best president ever) had an app. So I thought maybe since I‚Äôm such a big fan of him I should download it. So I proceeded to download, but it was so slow so I put my phone down and continued with my night. Then my girlfriend came home, she started getting ready for bed while I sat in my living room and started watching TV. So I thought maybe it finished downloading, checked my phone and the app was already open. After a a couple seconds my phone screen went black, then I heard my girlfriend scream upstairs so I dropped my phone and ran. I crashed through the door and seen DONALD TRUMP himself trying to rape my girlfriend. When I tried to grab him off of her he tried to rape me too. It was the single most horrific day of my life. My poops fall out now when I sit down and I have to clinch my butt when I walk so it won‚Äôt fall out. I can‚Äôt ride bikes anymore because the seat goes up my butthole. He tried to give me ‚Äúhush‚Äù money but I felt like coming out on an app review was my only opportunity to speak my truth.I can never live my life the same after that day. #MeToo
attributes.title: This app rapes people‚ÄºÔ∏èüò±

attributes.review: According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way that a bee should be able to fly. Its wings are too small to get its fat little body off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway. Because bees don‚Äôt care what humans think is impossible.‚Äù SEQ. 75 - ‚ÄúINTRO TO BARRY‚Äù INT. BENSON HOUSE - DAY ANGLE ON: Sneakers on the ground. Camera PANS UP to reveal BARRY BENSON‚ÄôS BEDROOM ANGLE ON: Barry‚Äôs hand flipping through different sweaters in his closet. BARRY Yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black, yellow black...oohh, black and yellow... ANGLE ON: Barry wearing the sweater he picked, looking in the mirror. BARRY (CONT‚ÄôD) Yeah, let‚Äôs shake it up a little. He picks the black and yellow one. He then goes to the sink, takes the top off a CONTAINER OF HONEY, and puts some honey into his hair. He squirts some in his mouth and gargles. Then he takes the lid off the bottle, and rolls some on like deodorant. CUT TO: INT. BENSON HOUSE KITCHEN - CONTINUOUS Barry‚Äôs mother, JANET BENSON, yells up at Barry. JANET BENSON Barry, breakfast is ready! CUT TO: "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 1. INT. BARRY‚ÄôS ROOM - CONTINUOUS BARRY Coming! SFX: Phone RINGING. Barry‚Äôs antennae vibrate as they RING like a phone. Barry‚Äôs hands are wet. He looks around for a towel. BARRY (CONT‚ÄôD) Hang on a second! He wipes his hands on his sweater, and pulls his antennae down to his ear and mouth. BARRY (CONT'D) Hello? His best friend, ADAM FLAYMAN, is on the other end. ADAM Barry? BARRY Adam? ADAM Can you believe this is happening? BARRY Can‚Äôt believe it. I‚Äôll pick you up. Barry sticks his stinger in a sharpener. SFX: BUZZING AS HIS STINGER IS SHARPENED. He tests the sharpness with his finger. SFX: Bing. BARRY (CONT‚ÄôD) Looking sharp. ANGLE ON: Barry hovering down the hall, sliding down the staircase bannister. Barry‚Äôs mother, JANET BENSON, is in the kitchen. JANET BENSON Barry, why don‚Äôt you use the stairs? Your father paid good money for those. "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 2. BARRY Sorry, I‚Äôm excited. Barry‚Äôs father, MARTIN BENSON, ENTERS. He‚Äôs reading a NEWSPAPER with the HEADLINE, ‚ÄúQueen gives birth to thousandtuplets: Resting Comfortably.‚Äù MARTIN BENSON Here‚Äôs the graduate. We‚Äôre very proud of you, Son. And a perfect report card, all B‚Äôs. JANET BENSON (mushing Barry‚Äôs hair) Very proud. BARRY Ma! I‚Äôve got a thing going here. Barry re-adjusts his hair, starts to leave. JANET BENSON You‚Äôve got some lint on your fuzz. She picks it off. BARRY Ow, that‚Äôs me! MARTIN BENSON Wave to us. We‚Äôll be in row 118,000. Barry zips off. BARRY Bye! JANET BENSON Barry, I told you, stop flying in the house! CUT TO: SEQ. 750 - DRIVING TO GRADUATION EXT. BEE SUBURB - MORNING A GARAGE DOOR OPENS. Barry drives out in his CAR. "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 3. ANGLE ON: Barry‚Äôs friend, ADAM FLAYMAN, standing by the curb. He‚Äôs reading a NEWSPAPER with the HEADLINE: ‚ÄúFrisbee Hits Hive: Internet Down. Bee-stander: ‚ÄúI heard a sound, and next thing I knew...wham-o!.‚Äù Barry drives up, stops in front of Adam. Adam jumps in. BARRY Hey, Adam. ADAM Hey, Barry. (pointing at Barry‚Äôs hair) Is that fuzz gel? BARRY A little. It‚Äôs a special day. Finally graduating. ADAM I never thought I‚Äôd make it. BARRY Yeah, three days of grade school, three days of high school. ADAM Those were so awkward. BARRY Three days of college. I‚Äôm glad I took off one day in the middle and just hitchhiked around the hive. ADAM You did come back different. They drive by a bee who‚Äôs jogging. ARTIE Hi Barry! BARRY (to a bee pedestrian) Hey Artie, growing a mustache? Looks good. Barry and Adam drive from the suburbs into the city. ADAM Hey, did you hear about Frankie? "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 4. BARRY Yeah. ADAM You going to his funeral? BARRY No, I‚Äôm not going to his funeral. Everybody knows you sting someone you die, you don‚Äôt waste it on a squirrel. He was such a hot head. ADAM Yeah, I guess he could‚Äôve just gotten out of the way. The DRIVE through a loop de loop. BARRY AND ADAM Whoa...Whooo...wheee!! ADAM I love this incorporating the amusement park right into our regular day. BARRY I guess that‚Äôs why they say we don‚Äôt need vacations. CUT TO: SEQ. 95 - GRADUATION EXT. GRADUATION CEREMONY - CONTINUOUS Barry and Adam come to a stop. They exit the car, and fly over the crowd to their seats. * BARRY * (re: graduation ceremony) * Boy, quite a bit of pomp...under * the circumstances. * They land in their seats. BARRY (CONT‚ÄôD) Well Adam, today we are men. "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 5. ADAM We are. BARRY Bee-men. ADAM Amen! BARRY Hallelujah. Barry hits Adam‚Äôs forehead. Adam goes into the rapture. An announcement comes over the PA. ANNOUNCER (V.O) Students, faculty, distinguished bees...please welcome, Dean Buzzwell. ANGLE ON: DEAN BUZZWELL steps up to the podium. The podium has a sign that reads: ‚ÄúWelcome Graduating Class of:‚Äù, with train-station style flipping numbers after it. BUZZWELL Welcome New Hive City graduating class of... The numbers on the podium change to 9:15. BUZZWELL (CONT‚ÄôD) ...9:15. (he clears his throat) And that concludes our graduation ceremonies. And begins your career at Honex Industries. BARRY Are we going to pick our job today? ADAM I heard it‚Äôs just orientation. The rows of chairs change in transformer-like mechanical motion to Universal Studios type tour trams. Buzzwell walks off stage. BARRY (re: trams) Whoa, heads up! Here we go. "Bee Movie" - JS REVISIONS 8/13/07 6. SEQ. 125 - ‚ÄúFACTORY‚Äù FEMALE VOICE (V.O) Keep your hands and antennas inside the tram at all times. (in Spanish) Dejen las manos y antennas adentro del tram a todos tiempos. BARRY I wonder what it‚Äôs going to be like? ADAM A little scary. Barry shakes Adam. BARRY AND ADAM AAHHHH! The tram passes under SIGNS READING: ‚ÄúHonex: A Division of Honesco: A Part of the Hexagon Group.‚Äù TRUDY Welcome to Honex, a division of Honesco, and a part of the Hexagon group. BARRY This is it! The Honex doors OPEN,

attributes.review: I was so excited to support MY President once again during this 2020 election but it took so long to download that I started to look at other candidates. Then when it did asked for my information immediately which I gave because I want nothing but the best for my president; I was raised right. But once I gave them my number I immediately got a text from his team personally. I instantly opened it so excited to finally get in touch with the greatest mind of the 21st century. But when I opened it the only thing in it was a picture of my favorite stuffed puppy bound and gagged with a picture of today‚Äôs newspaper with the caption if you want to see your puppy again you‚Äôll let the president grab you in your p**y. I can‚Äôt tell you how upset I was but thankfully I had my tik tok app for comfort and found another stuffed animal on Amazon. Bottom line don‚Äôt get this app if you value your safety and also don‚Äôt f**k with a millennial and her apps.
attributes.title: This app stole my brain.
